sections.title: Maintenance help needed
text: We really could use your help!
Come along and lend a hand! Coffee/tea, biscuits and dougnuts too. And good company!
Fly or drive afterwards and enjoy our facilities.
Clubhouse - needs a sweep. And sofa needs a good polish with leather restorers. I cleaned it last week as minor mould spots appeared. But needs protecting.
2 helpers? With the necessary polish items. We have broom.
Club Room needs sweeping and table polished and tidy up
2 helpers? With the necessary polish items. We have broom.
Site tidy up - numerous bottles, cans and misc items need collecting and taking to tip
2-4 helpers with gloves , we have black bags.
Memorial ‘garden’ needs weeding and tidy up
2 helpers with weeding stuff and ‘green’ fingers. I’ve cut off most of offending branches and bramble. Quick task
Also we need to re-stack and tidy up outside rear of clubhouse
The remains of the fallen tree is ‘parked’ in parking area . Chainsaw enthusiasts welcome to help themselves to firewood. BUT at own risk! Not a club task!
Hopefully we will  also arrange a quick mow of strip
